cn.description:
发现元素周期表的全新世界，尽在我们创新的3D应用中！沉浸在全新、视觉上令人惊叹的元素世界中。我们的应用提供极简和引人入胜的体验，使探索元素周期表成为一次独特而引人入胜的旅程。

通过我们直观的界面和极简设计，您可以轻松浏览各个元素。每个元素在引人入胜的3D环境中栩栩如生，让您以前所未有的方式可视化其结构。观察元素如何相互作用，以全新的视角揭示它们的性质。

想要了解特定元素更多吗？我们的应用提供有关每个元素的详细且易于理解的信息，涵盖从其物理和化学性质到历史和实际用途的所有方面。学习元素周期表从未如此易于获取和令人兴奋。

我们的应用非常适合学生、专业人士和科学爱好者。无论您是学习化学还是只是对元素世界感到好奇，我们的3D应用都提供了一种教育性和富有娱乐性的体验。

立即下载，沉浸在元素周期表之美中，以前所未有的方式探索、学习并着迷！

cn.description:
All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Enemy drop list, guides and quest-line guides.

- Interactive Maps
- Sort and Filter
- Event Timers and Notifications
- Guides for Quests

Guides and Maps are partially available for free, but a Pro membership is required to access all content

Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord.


Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. 

apple standard EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

You will be able to explore your eating habits visually and improve your eating habits. No calories and no numbers are shown in the app! 

Features:
+ Beautifully minimalist food diary app
+ In-App Camera And Filter
+ No calories No Pressure
+ Visualizes all your diets and shows your diet balance clearly!
+ Crazy and Interactive Foody Face
+ Learn how to eat mindfully and correctly right now!

Don’t make Foody Face angry! Tap download right now!

----------

The inspiration behind FoodyLife is that nowadays people pay little attention to what they eat and often eat unhealthy food. Although there are many similar apps on the market (e.g. Fitness App, Calorie counter...), most of them focus mainly on “numbers”, such as how many calories the user has eaten and how long the user should exercise to get rid of those calories, or sending the user notifications when they should get up to exercise or if they have eaten too much.

FoodyLife’ is an app that helps users track their daily diet by allowing them to keep their own food diary. The app shows neither calories nor numbers; instead, users have only to take a picture, enter their diet information, then they are able their overall diet balance. It is very simple and highly effective. Users can explore their eating habits visually, improving self-consciousness about eating habits.

hk.description:
An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets.

Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, use two thumbs like a traditional controller, or control the game with a physical gamepad. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.


About the Author:
Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

hk.description:
果斷決策，攻擊快如閃電！作為最終的驅魔師，依照情況選擇攻擊方式、強化戰鬥牌組，並組合特性與道具——在死亡降臨之前拯救被詛咒的靈魂吧！

▪ 即時回合制戰鬥
你做出決定的瞬間，敵人立即反應！每一步都充滿快速而緊張的動作。

▪ 四位擁有獨特策略的角色
每位角色擁有8種獨特的攻擊方式、專屬動畫和2個被動特性。根據每次遊戲調整你的遊戲風格。

▪ 時間限制 - 快速思考，更快出擊！
每次遊戲中，你只有7分鐘來擊敗所有敵人。你為這一刻進行了殘酷的訓練。

▪ 物品與特性組合
在戰鬥中自動激活的戰略協同。時機和適應能力是勝利的關鍵！

▪ Roguelite
在一次遊戲中清除所有7個地圖和Boss，否則將被重置！但同一地圖通關3次將解鎖進度。收集金幣，構建更強大的卡組，再次挑戰！

▪ 完全支援控制器
支援Xbox、DualShock/DualSense以及大多數xInput/Direct Input控制器。

▪ 支援12種語言
支援韓語、英語、日語、中文（簡體/繁體）、法語、德語、義大利語、西班牙語、葡萄牙語、巴西葡萄牙語和俄語。

▪ 離線遊戲
所有資料皆儲存在本機，不需連接網路。
注意- 移除應用程式將會刪除所有儲存資料。

hk.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

官方臉書:
https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/
官方論壇(英文):
http://www.neomonstersforum.com/
官方客服郵箱:
neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net

服務條款:
https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/
隱私政策:
https://www.zigzagame.com/Privacy-Policy/

在台湾和日本鐵路線上駕駛電車並載客。

・簡單的益智遊戲
“東京電車２”是一款規則簡單的益智遊戲。無需專業知識。
火車迷，遊戲迷，人人都能享受。

・致所有將成為行動調度員的人
在日本的早晨，顧客們正在等待火車的到來去上班。
讓我們啟動火車並運送客戶。

- 遊戲目標
日本鐵路公司是營利性組織。讓我們以高營業利潤為目標吧！

・如何產生利潤
票價收入-出發成本=營業利潤。

票價收入是在車站的顧客登上火車時產生的。
示例）如果兩名乘客在票價為 20 的車站上車，他們將獲得 40。

發車費按發車時的車廂數收取。
示例）2 節車廂的火車為 30，4 節車廂的火車為 40，10 節車廂的火車為 70。


一個人可以乘坐一輛車。
票價收入是在乘客登上火車時產生的。
調整行駛距離和車輛數量以獲得最大利潤。
離境費用。如果你開的火車太多，而佔用率下降，你就會損失收入。

·操作方法
控制非常簡單，規則也很簡單。
你所要做的就是調整列車的車廂數量，讓列車在最佳時間出發。
隨著遊戲的進行，將會出現各種變化，例如特快列車和換乘站。

·體積
享受 50 多條路線。
請體驗日本鐵路公司的各種運輸策略。

- 沒有廣告，沒有計費
沒有應用內購買。無廣告。
請專心玩遊戲。孩子們可以安心地玩耍。
讓我們分享在 社交媒體 上駕駛的結果。

・鐵路玩
JR東日本、JR東海、JR西日本、JR九州、東武、東急、西武、京王、京急、京阪、阪急、阪神、近鐵、名鐵、小田急、南海、西鐵、相鐵、京成、東京地鐵、大阪地鐵、都營地鐵, 筑波快遞

・容量約130MB
存儲負擔也小。根本沒有繁重的處理。

tw.description:
An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets.

Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, use two thumbs like a traditional controller, or control the game with a physical gamepad. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.


About the Author:
Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

果斷決策，攻擊快如閃電！作為最終的驅魔師，依照情況選擇攻擊方式、強化戰鬥牌組，並組合特性與道具——在死亡降臨之前拯救被詛咒的靈魂吧！

▪ 即時回合制戰鬥
你做出決定的瞬間，敵人立即反應！每一步都充滿快速而緊張的動作。

▪ 四位擁有獨特策略的角色

每次遊戲中，你只有7分鐘來擊敗所有敵人。你為這一刻進行了殘酷的訓練。

us.description:
Think Fast, Strike Faster! As the ultimate exorcist, choose your attacks wisely, upgrade combat deck, combine traits and items, and save the cursed souls—before death finds you.

▪ Real-Time Turn-Based Combat
Enemies react the moment you make a decision—! Fast, tense action with every move.

▪ 4 Characters with Unique Strategies
Each with 8 uniques attack types, exclusive animations, and 2 passive traits. Adapt your playstyle for every run.

▪ Time Limit - Think Fast, Strike Faster!
You have just 7 minutes to defeat all enemies in each run. You've been relentlessly trained for this moment.

▪ Item & Trait Combinations
Strategic synergies that activate automatically during battle. Timing and adaptability are the keys to victory!

▪ Roguelite
Clear all 7 maps and the boss in a single run—or get reset! But clearing the same map 3 times unlocks progress. Collect coins, build a stronger deck, and dive back in!

▪ 12 Languages Supported
 Korean, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Russian. 

▪ Offline Game
All data is stored locally. No network required. Be Aware. Uninstalling the app will erase saved data.

snowgames0629@gmail.com

You will be able to explore your eating habits visually and improve your eating habits. No calories and no numbers are shown in the app! 

Features:
+ Beautifully minimalist food diary app
+ In-App Camera And Filter
+ No calories No Pressure
+ Visualizes all your diets and shows your diet balance clearly!
+ Crazy and Interactive Foody Face
+ Learn how to eat mindfully and correctly right now!

Don’t make Foody Face angry! Tap download right now!

----------

The inspiration behind FoodyLife is that nowadays people pay little attention to what they eat and often eat unhealthy food. Although there are many similar apps on the market (e.g. Fitness App, Calorie counter...), most of them focus mainly on “numbers”, such as how many calories the user has eaten and how long the user should exercise to get rid of those calories, or sending the user notifications when they should get up to exercise or if they have eaten too much.

FoodyLife’ is an app that helps users track their daily diet by allowing them to keep their own food diary. The app shows neither calories nor numbers; instead, users have only to take a picture, enter their diet information, then they are able their overall diet balance. It is very simple and highly effective. Users can explore their eating habits visually, improving self-consciousness about eating habits.

us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策

us.description:
SOLVE A CRYPTIC BOX
Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is the first standalone chapter to the cooperative point-and-click puzzle game series 'Cryptic Killer'. Join forces with a friend and play as detective partners Ally and Old Dog in our debut two-player escape room adventure.



IMPORTANT: "Unboxing the Cryptic Killer" is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game, that requires each player to have their own copy on either mobile, tablet, PC or Mac. Internet connection and voice communication are essential. Need a Player Two? Join our Discord community!



Two seasoned detectives, Ally and Old Dog, are entangled in a chilling unsolved case. Lured on a perilous trail, they fall into the clutches of the enigmatic Cryptic Killer they've been relentlessly pursuing. The stakes are sky-high as two innocent lives hang in the balance. In order to save them, Ally and Old Dog must unravel a box of intricate puzzles masterfully designed by the nefarious killer. Test your mettle and join this high-stakes race against time, where every puzzle solved is a step closer to unmasking the Cryptic Killer.



THE ONLY WAY TO ESCAPE IS TO WORK TOGETHER
Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is a puzzle for exactly two players. The name of the game is collaboration. Each player takes on one of the two roles and works their way through a series of challenging puzzles. You'll each see one half of the same puzzle and must work together to crack the codes and escape the Cryptic Killer's clutches.



FEATURES LIST
▶Two Player Co-Op 
In Unboxing the Cryptic Killer, the detectives are separated. You’ll see different items and clues than your partner, and will be tested on your communication!
▶Challenging Collaborative Puzzles
Two brains are better than one when it comes to cracking the Cryptic Killer's codes.
▶Unravel a Thrilling Story
Track the Cryptic Killer's movements as Detectives Old Dog and Ally in this ongoing murder mystery saga.
▶Explore Illustrated Worlds
Unboxing the Cryptic Killer features hand-illustrated environments that are inspired by noir novels.
▶Draw on… Everything!
You cannot solve a case without taking notes. At any time in the game, you can whip out a notebook and pen to make notes and scribble on your environment.

tr.description:
Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability. Now with rewarded leaderboards for even more fun and challenge!

The Bloons are back and this time they mean business! Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool new Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon!

Featuring 2 brand new Towers, cool Special Agents, glorious retina graphics, original Tracks and Special Missions, a whole new tier of Specialty Building upgrades, and the powerful Monkey Lab to further upgrade your towers, Bloons TD 5 delivers hours and hours of fun, challenging play to fans and new players alike.

Hours and Hours of Awesome Gameplay:
* 90+ Tracks
* 21 powerful towers with Activated Abilities and 2 upgrade paths
* 10 Special Agents
* Online Co-op play
* Multi-track Odyssey Challenges
* Boss Bloon Special Events
* 10 Special Missions
* 250+ Random Missions
* Daily Challenges
* New Bloon enemies - tougher Camos, Regrow Bloons, and the fearsome ZOMG
* 50+ Game Center Achievements and Challenges
* iCloud Support
* 3 different game modes
* Freeplay mode after mastering a track
* 4 difficulty settings and family-friendly theme so anyone can play

And that's just the beginning - regular planned updates will keep Bloons TD 5 fresh, fun, and challenging for many months to come. Now it's time to pop some Bloons!

Remember to save to iCloud after each victory or purchase to save your progress. 

iPad version also available - check out Bloons TD 5 HD for full screen UI awesomeness!

Think Fast, Strike Faster! As the ultimate exorcist, choose your attacks wisely, upgrade combat deck, combine traits and items, and save the cursed souls—before death finds you.

▪ Real-Time Turn-Based Combat
Enemies react the moment you make a decision—! Fast, tense action with every move.

▪ 4 Characters with Unique Strategies
Each with 8 uniques attack types, exclusive animations, and 2 passive traits. Adapt your playstyle for every run.

▪ Time Limit - Think Fast, Strike Faster!
You have just 7 minutes to defeat all enemies in each run. You've been relentlessly trained for this moment.

▪ Item & Trait Combinations
Strategic synergies that activate automatically during battle. Timing and adaptability are the keys to victory!

Clear all 7 maps and the boss in a single run—or get reset! But clearing the same map 3 times unlocks progress. Collect coins, build a stronger deck, and dive back in!

All data is stored locally. No network required. Be Aware. Uninstalling the app will erase saved data.

You will be able to explore your eating habits visually and improve your eating habits. No calories and no numbers are shown in the app! 

Features:
+ Beautifully minimalist food diary app
+ In-App Camera And Filter
+ No calories No Pressure
+ Visualizes all your diets and shows your diet balance clearly!
+ Crazy and Interactive Foody Face
+ Learn how to eat mindfully and correctly right now!

Don’t make Foody Face angry! Tap download right now!

----------

The inspiration behind FoodyLife is that nowadays people pay little attention to what they eat and often eat unhealthy food. Although there are many similar apps on the market (e.g. Fitness App, Calorie counter...), most of them focus mainly on “numbers”, such as how many calories the user has eaten and how long the user should exercise to get rid of those calories, or sending the user notifications when they should get up to exercise or if they have eaten too much.

FoodyLife’ is an app that helps users track their daily diet by allowing them to keep their own food diary. The app shows neither calories nor numbers; instead, users have only to take a picture, enter their diet information, then they are able their overall diet balance. It is very simple and highly effective. Users can explore their eating habits visually, improving self-consciousness about eating habits.

tr.description:
An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets.

Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, use two thumbs like a traditional controller, or control the game with a physical gamepad. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.


About the Author:
Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Realistic Violence
tr.releaseNotes:
The shadows over Hue County grow darker in the wake of a shocking murder.

Step into the elegant Noir Mansion and interrogate six suspects too sharp for their own good. They'll point fingers in every direction and offer up promises of honesty. 

But you know better. Trust nothing but your clue sheet...

Could it have been Crime Reporter Scarlett with the Mini Revolver? Maybe Private Detective Mustard used the "Civil War" Musket with Bayonet? Did Risk Analyst Plum turn himself into a liability with the Billiard Stick, or perhaps Lawyer Peacock cracked with the Meat Tenderiser. Did Signature Forger White sign off Boddy's death with the Silver Candelabra? Or maybe Con Artist Green phoned in a deadly performance with the Rotary Phone... 

With the Noir Mansion crime scene, you can toggle the special Noir filter at any time during your game! See the mansion in its full-colour glory, or drench it in deep, cinematic shadows. 

You'll also unlock Noir-themed cosmetics to dress up in true vintage style!

INCLUDES:
- A BRAND-NEW CRIME SCENE – The highly requested film-noir theme arrives in Clue/Cluedo!
- THEMED COSMETICS – This crime scene includes a new player avatar, a different card back, a themed clue sheet, a sleek dice set and 12 new tokens.
- MORE STORY TO EXPLORE – Delve into the murky backstories of each suspect and uncover their motives.
tr.description:
Join fellow detectives all over the world in the official digital board game version of Clue/Cluedo! Gather crucial evidence, interrogate suspects and solve the original murder mystery.

Follow Miss Scarlett, Colonel Mustard, Professor Plum, Chef White, Solicitor Peacock and Mayor Green through the iconic Tudor Mansion, unlocking their motives and alibis as you go. 

Enjoy Clue/Cluedo the way you remember it in Classic Mode, or jump in for a quick game with Clue Cards mode. Alternatively, if you want to really test your sleuthing skills, try a new investigation format available exclusively to Clue/Cluedo – Ultimate Detective.

In Ultimate Detective Mode, everyone answers suggestions at the same time…but secretly! 

Face your suspects in a direct interrogation as you rely on your skills of deduction to get to the truth. Experience the mystery, solve the murder and become a top-tier detective!

HOW TO PLAY CLUE/CLUEDO: 

1. Three cards are dealt face-down and set aside – this is the solution to the crime!
2. Everyone is dealt three Clue Cards. These are automatically crossed off your clue sheet, as they can’t be part of the solution. 
3. Roll the dice and move around the board. 
4. When you enter a room, you can make a suggestion – select who you think the murderer is, what weapon they used and where the crime happened. 
5. Other players will then aim to disprove your suggestion; if one of your suggestions matches a card in their hand, they show you that card to disprove it. 
6. Use your clue sheet to keep track of which characters, weapons and rooms have been disproven. 
7. Think you’ve figured it out? It’s time to make an accusation! Be careful though – if you’re right, you win, but if you are wrong, you’re out! 

FEATURES

- THE CLASSIC TUDOR MANSION – Play the beloved original board game, now rendered in stunning 3D animation and entirely ad-free! 
- A BRAND-NEW GAME MODE – Exclusive to the digital version of Clue/Cluedo, Ultimate Detective Mode lets you interrogate multiple characters at once.
- MULTIPLE MODES – Compete against cutting-edge AI opponents that adapt to your skill level for the perfect game, or challenge detectives around the world. 
- ADDITIONAL ORIGINAL CONTENT – What happened after the shocking events of Tudor Mansion? Find out in a series of original new crime scenes designed specifically for the digital version of Clue/Cluedo! New characters emerge, bringing with them new clues, motives and case files to consider as you travel around the world in search of the truth. 

Sharpen your mind with the iconic murder-mystery board game, now available on mobile!

tr.description:
Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP!

Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs!

Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge?

▶Features:
●  Build your Monster Collection
• Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters!
• Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential.
• Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power!

●  Form a Battle Strategy
• Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters.
• Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles!
• Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities.

●  Become the Champion
• Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure!
• Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey.
• Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle’s atrocity.

●  Take the Battle Online
• Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues!
• Complete 100+ online missions.
• Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards.

pt.description:
Explore a Tabela Periódica como nunca antes com o nosso inovador aplicativo 3D! Mergulhe no fascinante mundo dos elementos de uma forma totalmente nova e visualmente impressionante. Nosso aplicativo oferece uma experiência minimalista e envolvente que transforma a exploração da Tabela Periódica em uma jornada única e emocionante.

Com nossa interface intuitiva e design minimalista, você pode navegar facilmente pelos elementos. Cada elemento ganha vida em um envolvente ambiente 3D, permitindo que você visualize sua estrutura de uma maneira que nunca experimentou antes. Observe como os elementos interagem entre si e descubra suas propriedades de uma maneira totalmente nova.

Quer saber mais sobre um elemento específico? Nosso aplicativo fornece informações detalhadas e de fácil compreensão sobre cada elemento, desde suas propriedades físicas e químicas até sua história e usos práticos. A aprendizagem da Tabela Periódica nunca foi tão acessível e emocionante.

Além disso, nosso aplicativo é perfeito para estudantes, profissionais e entusiastas da ciência. Seja você estudando química ou apenas curioso sobre o mundo dos elementos, nosso aplicativo 3D oferece uma experiência educacional e divertida.

Baixe agora e mergulhe na beleza da Tabela Periódica de uma maneira que você nunca imaginou. Explore, aprenda e maravilhe-se com os elementos com nosso aplicativo 3D hoje!

pt.description:
Decide rápido e ataca mais depressa que todos! Como o exorcista supremo, escolhe os ataques certos, melhora o teu baralho de combate e combina traços e itens para salvares as almas amaldiçoadas — antes que a morte te alcance.

▪ Combate por Turnos em Tempo Real
Os inimigos reagem no momento em que tomas uma decisão! Ação rápida e intensa a cada jogada.

▪ 4 Personagens com Estratégias Únicas
Cada uma com 8 ataques distintos, animações exclusivas e 2 traços passivos. Adapta o teu estilo de jogo a cada partida.

▪ Limite de Tempo – Pensa rápido, ataca mais rápido!
Tens apenas 7 minutos para derrotar todos os inimigos. Foste treinado sem piedade para isto.

▪ Combinações de Itens e Traços
Sinergias estratégicas que se ativam automaticamente durante o combate. O segredo da vitória é o timing e a adaptação!

▪ Roguelite
Derrota os 7 mapas e o boss numa única sessão – ou começa de novo! Limpa o mesmo mapa 3 vezes para desbloquear o progresso. Junta moedas, reforça o teu baralho e volta à ação!

▪ Suporte total para comandos  
Compatível com Xbox, DualShock/DualSense e a maioria dos comandos xInput/Direct Input.  

▪ Suporte para 12 idiomas  
Coreano, Inglês, Japonês, Chinês (Simplificado/Tradicional), Francês, Alemão, Italiano, Espanhol, Português, Português do Brasil e Russo.

▪ Jogo offline
Todos os dados são guardados localmente. Não é necessária ligação à internet.
Atenção- Desinstalar a app irá apagar os dados guardados.

https://discord.gg/UaZApdWG93
